channel.title: Getting The Moparscape Client Music As .MP3 Files?
channel.description:
I can't play the Moparscape Client music ''directly on limewire'' because the music that comes with the client is MIDI, not MP3 :mad:
Sooo..: I want to get the moparscape music ''into'' the limewire library/audio, to play it DIRECTLY "on" the limewire program, not in windows media player..
So I put the 2 songs (Slough of Despair and Pandemonium) into Limewire/Saved, so that they appear ''IN'' limewire. But when I try to play them they start playing in Windows Media Player.. Simply because they aren't .mp3 files, but midi files.
Where can I download moparscape music as .mp3, so I can play them'' ''with'' the limewire-player? Does anyone know? [u][i][b]And I don't 'really' want a midi/mp3 converter, because that makes the sound quality too bad[/b][/i][/u]... :( :mad: :( :mad:
Please help:P I love the Moparscape songs called Slough of despair and Pandemonium :D :D

I can’t play the Moparscape Client music ‘‘directly on limewire’’ because the music that comes with the client is MIDI, not MP3 :mad:

Sooo…:

So I put the 2 songs (Slough of Despair and Pandemonium) into Limewire/Saved, so that they appear ‘‘IN’’ limewire. But when I try to play them they start playing in Windows Media Player… Simply because they aren’t .mp3 files, but midi files.
